long_description: If you like riding wooded trails as well as Moab slickrock, try the women's Shimano WM34 Bike Shoes. These rugged lace-ups have soles that enhance both pedaling efficiency and walking comfort. Multilayer uppers made of synthetic leather and mesh resist stretching. Classic lacing delivers even tension and walking comfort; shoelace keeper loop tucks laces neatly away. Fiberglass-reinforced polyamide shank plate provides optimum sole rigidity. Shimano WM34 Bike Shoes have rubber soles and EVA midsoles to enhance pedaling efficiency and walking comfort. Cleat-positioner cap helps introduce first-time clipless riders to SPD pedals.
short_description: If you like riding wooded trails as well as Moab slickrock, try the women's Shimano WM34 Bike Shoes. These rugged lace-ups have soles that enhance both pedaling efficiency and walking comfort.
